name: dtvem
description: Development dependencies for dtvem - requires Node.js via dtvem

scripts.test:coverage: go test -v -coverprofile=coverage.out -covermode=atomic ./src/... && go tool cover -html=coverage.out -o coverage.html
scripts.build: npm run build:cli && npm run build:shim
scripts.deploy:local: npm run build && copy dist\dtvem.exe %USERPROFILE%\.dtvem\bin\dtvem.exe && copy dist\dtvem-shim.exe %USERPROFILE%\.dtvem\bin\dtvem-shim.exe && echo Deploy complete. Run 'dtvem reshim' manually to update shims.
scripts.check: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test
